ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å¸¦æœ‰ç¼“å†²åŒºçš„å­—ç¬¦è¾“å…¥æµï¼›ä½¿ç”¨è¿™ä¸ªæµçš„æ—¶å€™ä¸éœ€è¦è‡ªå®šä¹‰charæ•°ç»„ï¼Œæˆ–è€…è¯´ä¸éœ€è¦è‡ªå®šä¹‰byteæ•°ç»„ï¼›è‡ªå¸¦ç¼“å†²ï¼

package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;

public class BufferedReaderTest01 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        FileReader reader = new FileReader("file");
        // å½“ä¸€ä¸ªæµçš„æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•ä¸­éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªæµçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªè¢«ä¼ è¿›æ¥çš„æµå«åšï¼šèŠ‚ç‚¹æµã€‚
        // å¤–éƒ¨è´Ÿè´£åŒ…è£…çš„è¿™ä¸ªæµï¼Œå«åšï¼šåŒ…è£…æµæˆ–è€…å«åšï¼šå¤„ç†æµã€‚
        // FileReaderå°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æµã€‚BufferedReaderå°±æ˜¯åŒ…è£…æµ/å¤„ç†æµã€‚
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(reader); // åªèƒ½ä¼ å­—ç¬¦æµ

        // ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼šä¸€æ¬¡èƒ½è¯»ä¸€è¡Œï¼›ä½†ä¸å¸¦æ¢è¡Œç¬¦ï¼
        String s = null;
        while((s = br.readLine()) != null){ // br.readLine()è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
            System.out.println(s);
        }

        // å…³é—­æµ,åªéœ€è¦å…³é—­æœ€å¤–å±‚æµå°±è¡Œï¼Œé‡Œé¢çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹æµä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å…³é—­ã€‚
        br.close();

    }
}

2.å­—ç¬¦è¾“å‡ºæµBufferedWriter

package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

import java.io.*;

public class BufferedWriterTest01 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        // åˆ›å»ºå¸¦æœ‰ç¼“å†²åŒºçš„å­—ç¬¦è¾“å‡ºæµ
        BufferedWriter writer = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("file"));

        // å¼€å§‹å†™
        writer.write("hello world!");
        writer.write("\n");
        writer.write("hello kitty!");

        // åˆ·æ–°
        writer.flush();
        // å…³é—­æœ€å¤–å±‚
        writer.close();
    }
}

package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

import java.io.*;

public class BufferedWriterTest01 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        // åˆ›å»ºå¸¦æœ‰ç¼“å†²åŒºçš„å­—ç¬¦è¾“å‡ºæµ
        BufferedWriter writer = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("file"));

        // å¦‚æœæƒ³è¦ä½¿ç”¨å­—èŠ‚è¾“å‡ºæµï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯éœ€è¦OutputStreamWriterè¿›è¡Œæµçš„è½¬æ¢
        // å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯å­—èŠ‚æµ
        OutputStreamWriter osw = new OutputStreamWriter(new FileOutputStream("file"));
        BufferedWriter writer1 = new BufferedWriter(osw);
        
        // åˆå¹¶åœ¨ä¸€èµ·
        BufferedWriter writer1 = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter
        (new FileOutputStream("file")));

        // å¼€å§‹å†™
        writer.write("hello world!");
        writer.write("\n");
        writer.write("hello kitty!");

        // åˆ·æ–°
        writer.flush();
        // å…³é—­æœ€å¤–å±‚
        writer.close();

}

2.InputStreamReader

BufferedReader(reader)ï¼Œé‡Œé¢åªèƒ½ä¼ å­—ç¬¦æµï¼›é‚£å¦‚æœæ˜¯å­—èŠ‚æµæ€ä¹ˆåŠå‘¢ï¼Ÿ

éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨è½¬æ¢æµï¼šInputStreamReaderï¼ŒæŠŠå°†å­—èŠ‚æµè½¬æ¢æˆå­—ç¬¦æµ 
package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

import java.io.*;

public class BufferedReaderTest02 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {

        FileInputStream fis = null;
        try {
            // å­—èŠ‚æµ
            fis = new FileInputStream("file");
            // é€šè¿‡è½¬æ¢æµè½¬æ¢ï¼ˆInputStreamReaderå°†å­—èŠ‚æµè½¬æ¢æˆå­—ç¬¦æµï¼‰
            // fisæ˜¯èŠ‚ç‚¹æµã€‚readeræ˜¯åŒ…è£…æµã€‚
            InputStreamReader reader = new InputStreamReader(fis);
            // æŠŠè½¬æ¢æˆå­—ç¬¦æµçš„å­—èŠ‚æµï¼Œä¼ è¿‡æ¥
            // readeræ˜¯èŠ‚ç‚¹æµã€‚bræ˜¯åŒ…è£…æµã€‚
            BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(reader);

            // ä¸Šé¢è¿›è¡Œåˆå¹¶
            BufferedReader br1 = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(new FileInputStream("file")));

            // è¿›è¡Œæ‰“å°
            String s = null;
            while((s = br1.readLine()) != null){
                System.out.println(s);
            }

            // å…³é—­
            br.close(); // å…³é—­æœ€å¤–å±‚

        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (fis != null) {
                try {
                    fis.close();
                } catch (IOException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

1.DataOutputStream

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰java.io.DataOutputStreamï¼šæ•°æ®ä¸“å±çš„æµï¼›ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…è£…æµï¼
ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰è¿™ä¸ªæµå¯ä»¥å°†æ•°æ®è¿åŒæ•°æ®çš„ç±»å‹ä¸€å¹¶å†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚
ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ä¸æ˜¯æ™®é€šæ–‡æœ¬æ–‡æ¡£ã€‚ï¼ˆè¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ä½¿ç”¨è®°äº‹æœ¬æ‰“ä¸å¼€ï¼‰

package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

import java.io.DataOutputStream;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;

public class DataOutputStreamTest01 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception{
        // åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®ä¸“å±çš„å­—èŠ‚è¾“å‡ºæµï¼ˆå†™ï¼‰
        DataOutputStream dos = new DataOutputStream(new FileOutputStream("file")); //ç”Ÿæˆçš„è¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œè®°äº‹æœ¬æ‰“ä¸å¼€
        // å†™æ•°æ®
        byte b = 100;
        short s = 200;
        int i = 300;
        long l = 400L;
        float f = 3.0F;
        double d = 3.14;
        boolean sex = false;
        char c = 'a';
        // å†™ï¼›æŠŠæ•°æ®ä»¥åŠæ•°æ®çš„ç±»å‹ä¸€å¹¶å†™å…¥åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶å½“ä¸­
       dos.writeByte(b);
       dos.writeShort(s);
       dos.writeInt(i);
       dos.writeLong(l);
       dos.writeFloat(f);
       dos.writeDouble(d);
       dos.writeBoolean(sex);
       dos.writeChar(c);

        // åˆ·æ–°
        dos.flush();
        
        // å…³é—­æœ€å¤–å±‚
        dos.close();
    }
}

2.DataInputStream

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰DataInputStreamï¼šæ•°æ®å­—èŠ‚è¾“å…¥æµã€‚
ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰DataOutputStreamå†™çš„æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåªèƒ½ä½¿ç”¨DataInputStreamå»è¯»ã€‚å¹¶ä¸”è¯»çš„æ—¶å€™ä½ éœ€è¦æå‰çŸ¥é“å†™å…¥çš„é¡ºåºï¼›è¯»çš„é¡ºåºéœ€è¦å’Œå†™çš„é¡ºåºä¸€è‡´ã€‚æ‰å¯ä»¥æ­£å¸¸å–å‡ºæ•°æ®ã€‚

package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.FileInputStream;

public class DataInputStreamTest01 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        // åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®ä¸“å±çš„å­—èŠ‚è¾“å…¥æµï¼ˆè¯»ï¼‰
        DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream("file"));
        // å¼€å§‹è¯»
        byte b = dis.readByte();
        short s = dis.readShort();
        int i = dis.readInt();
        long l = dis.readLong();
        float f = dis.readFloat();
        double d = dis.readDouble();
        boolean sex = dis.readBoolean();
        char c = dis.readChar();
        // æ‰“å°

        System.out.println(b);
        System.out.println(s);
        System.out.println(i);
        System.out.println(l);
        System.out.println(f);
        System.out.println(d);
        System.out.println(sex);
        System.out.println(c);

        // å…³é—­æµ
        dis.close();
    }
}

package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.PrintStream;

public class PrintStreamTest {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        System.out.println("hello world");
        // å®é™…ä¸Šä¸Šè¿°ä»£ç å¯ä»¥æ‹†åˆ†æˆ
        PrintStream ps = System.out;
        ps.println("hello world");

        // å¯ä»¥æ”¹å˜æ ‡å‡†è¾“å‡ºæµçš„è¾“å‡ºæ–¹å‘ï¼›
        // ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šæ ‡å‡†è¾“å‡ºæµä¸åœ¨æŒ‡å‘æ§åˆ¶å°ï¼ŒæŒ‡å‘logæ–‡ä»¶
        PrintStream printStream = new PrintStream(new FileOutputStream("log"));
        // ä¿®æ”¹è¾“å‡ºæ–¹å‘
        System.setOut(printStream);

        // è¾“å‡º
        System.out.println("Hello World"); //ä¸ä¼šå†è¾“å‡ºåˆ°æ§åˆ¶å°ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯åˆ°logæ–‡ä»¶

    }
}

2.æ—¥å¿—å·¥å…·ç±»

é‚£ä¹ˆæ ‡å‡†è¾“å‡ºæµPrintStreamæœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆç”¨å‘¢ï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸å¦¨å†™ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„æ—¥å¿—å·¥å…·ç±»ï¼

package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.PrintStream;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;

// æ—¥å¿—å·¥å…·
public class Logger {
    // è®°å½•æ—¥å¿—çš„æ–¹æ³•
   public static void log(String msg) {
       try {
           PrintStream out = new PrintStream(new FileOutputStream("log.txt",true));
           // æ”¹å˜æµçš„æ–¹å‘
           System.setOut(out);
           // è·å–ç³»ç»Ÿå½“å‰æ—¶é—´
           Date nowDate = new Date();
           // æ ¼å¼ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢
           SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss SSS");
           String myNowdate = sdf.format(nowDate);
           // æ‰“å°
           System.out.println(myNowdate+":"+msg);

       } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
           e.printStackTrace();
       }

   }
}

package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

public class LoggerTest {

        Logger.log("è°ƒç”¨äº†UserServiceçš„doSome()æ–¹æ³•");

        // åœ¨log.txtæ‰“å°çš„ç»“æœ
       /* 2022-07-22 08:47:49 667:è°ƒç”¨äº†Systemç±»çš„gc()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå»ºè®®å¯åŠ¨åƒåœ¾å›æ”¶
        2022-07-22 08:47:49 703:è°ƒç”¨äº†UserServiceçš„doSome()æ–¹æ³•

java.io.File
1ã€Fileç±»å’Œå››å¤§å®¶æ—æ²¡æœ‰å…³ç³»ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥Fileç±»ä¸èƒ½å®Œæˆæ–‡ä»¶çš„è¯»å’Œå†™ã€‚

æ–‡ä»¶å’Œç›®å½•è·¯å¾„åçš„æŠ½è±¡è¡¨ç¤ºå½¢å¼ã€‚

ä¸€ä¸ªFileå¯¹è±¡æœ‰å¯èƒ½å¯¹åº”çš„æ˜¯ç›®å½•ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯èƒ½æ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶ï¼›Fileåªæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè·¯å¾„åçš„æŠ½è±¡è¡¨ç¤ºå½¢å¼ï¼›ä¸èƒ½é€šè¿‡Fileå®Œæˆæ–‡ä»¶çš„è¯»å’Œå†™

1.å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•1

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰exists()æ–¹æ³•ï¼šåˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰creatNewFile()æ–¹æ³•ï¼šä»¥æ–‡ä»¶çš„å½¢å¼åˆ›å»ºå‡ºæ¥

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰mkdir()æ–¹æ³•ï¼šä»¥ç›®å½•çš„å½¢å¼åˆ›å»ºå‡ºæ¥ï¼›åˆ›å»ºå¤šé‡ç›®å½•mkdirs()æ–¹æ³•

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰è·å–å½“å‰æ–‡ä»¶çš„çˆ¶è·¯å¾„ï¼š

æ–¹æ³•1ï¼š ä½¿ç”¨getParent()ï¼Œè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªString

package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

import java.io.File;

public class FileTest01 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        // åˆ›å»ºFileå¯¹è±¡
        File f1 = new File("D:\\file");
        // 1ã€åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼›exists()æ–¹æ³•
        System.out.println(f1.exists()); // false

        // 2ã€å¦‚æœD:\fileä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™ä»¥æ–‡ä»¶çš„å½¢å¼åˆ›å»ºå‡ºæ¥ï¼›createNewFile()æ–¹æ³•
        if (!f1.exists()) {
            f1.createNewFile();
        }

        // 3ã€å¦‚æœD:\fileä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™ä»¥ç›®å½•çš„å½¢å¼åˆ›å»ºå‡ºæ¥ï¼›mkdir()æ–¹æ³•
        if (!f1.exists()) {
            f1.mkdir();
        }

        // 4ã€åˆ›å»ºå¤šé‡ç›®å½•ï¼›mkdirs()æ–¹æ³•
        File f2 = new File("D:/a/b/c/d");
        if (!f2.exists()) {
            f2.mkdirs();
        }

        // 5ã€è·å–å½“å‰æ–‡ä»¶çš„çˆ¶è·¯å¾„
        File f3 = new File("D:\\pythonå­¦ä¹ \\PyCharm Community Edition 2021.2.2");
        // ç¬¬ä¸€ç§ï¼šä½¿ç”¨getParent()ï¼Œè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªString
        String parentPath = f3.getParent();
        System.out.println(parentPath); // D:\pythonå­¦ä¹ 
        // ç¬¬äºŒç§ï¼šä½¿ç”¨getParentFile()ï¼Œè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªFileï¼›æ•ˆæœæ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„
        File parentFile = f3.getParentFile();
        System.out.println(parentFile); // D:\pythonå­¦ä¹ 

        // 6ã€è·å–å½“å‰æ–‡ä»¶çš„ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„
        File f4 = new File("file");
        System.out.println(f4.getAbsolutePath()); // C:\Users\86177\IdeaProjects\JavaSe1\file

    }
}

2.å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•2

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰getName()ï¼šè·å–å½“å‰æ–‡ä»¶çš„åå­—

ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰isDirectory()ï¼šåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç›®å½•

ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰isFile()ï¼šåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰lastModified()ï¼šè·å–æ–‡ä»¶æœ€åä¸€æ¬¡ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´ï¼›å¾—åˆ°çš„æ˜¯æ¯«ç§’æ•°ï¼Œè¿”å›longå‹

ï¼ˆ5ï¼‰length()ï¼šè·å–æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°ï¼Œç»“æœæ˜¯å­—èŠ‚

package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

import java.io.File;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Date;

public class FileTest02 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        File  f1 = new File("C:\\Javaå­¦ä¹ \\javaSEå­¦ä¹ \\2.1JavaSEè¿›é˜¶ç¬”è®°\\javase\\Copy02.java");
        // 1ã€è·å–æ–‡ä»¶åï¼ŒgetName()æ–¹æ³•
        System.out.println("æ–‡ä»¶å:"+f1.getName()); // æ–‡ä»¶å:Copy02.java

        // 2ã€åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç›®å½•ï¼ŒisDirectory()æ–¹æ³•
        System.out.println(f1.isDirectory()); // false

        // 3ã€åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ï¼ŒisFile()æ–¹æ³•
        System.out.println(f1.isFile()); // true

        // 4ã€è·å–æ–‡ä»¶æœ€åä¸€æ¬¡ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´ï¼ŒlastModified()æ–¹æ³•
        // å¾—åˆ°çš„æ˜¯æ¯«ç§’æ•°
        long modifytTime = f1.lastModified();
        // å°†æ€»æ¯«ç§’æ•°è½¬æ¢æˆæ—¥æœŸ
        Date date = new Date(modifytTime);
        // æ ¼å¼åŒ–
        SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss SSS");
        System.out.println(sdf.format(date)); //2020-03-11 14:35:46 154

        // 5ã€è·å–æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°ï¼Œlength()æ–¹æ³•
        System.out.println(f1.length()); //1490 å­—èŠ‚
        
    }
}

3.listFilesæ–¹æ³•

Fileä¸­çš„listFilesæ–¹æ³•ï¼›è·å–å½“å‰ç›®å½•ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰çš„å­æ–‡ä»¶ï¼›è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªFile[]æ•°ç»„

package com.bjpowernode.java.io;

import java.io.File;

public class FileTest03 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        File f = new File("C:\\Javaå­¦ä¹ \\javaSEå­¦ä¹ \\2.1JavaSEè¿›é˜¶ç¬”è®°\\javase\\chapter15\\src");
        // è°ƒç”¨listFiles()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªFile[]æ•°ç»„
        File[] files = f.listFiles();
        // ç”¨å¢å¼ºforå¾ªç¯æ‰“å°
        for(File file :files){
            System.out.println(file.getAbsolutePath()); // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å­ç›®å½•çš„ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„
            System.out.println(file.getName()); //è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å­ç›®å½•çš„æ–‡ä»¶å
        }

    }
}
